Activity.SelectDateInfo: Select a date below and prepare to jump
Activity.SelectDateWaiting:
Strap in‚Äîthe more activities you play and the further you jump, the longer this'll take!

Bungie's API doesn't enable requesting activity history from a specific period, so we're doing a drive-by.
Activity.SelectDateFromGraph: Select a date with activities played from the graph above.
Activity.BookmarksSync: Sync bookmarks between devices with Voluspa.
Activity.SelectModeInfo: To drill down to a specific activity, select a mode from the interface above

State.ActivityHistoryError: Something went wrong while trying to load activity history. Please try again.
State.GenericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
State.HydratingReportsCache: Restoring reports data from local storage
State.NoBookmarks:
You haven't added any bookmarks yet!

You can sync your bookmarks by enabling sync in [Settings](/settings#sync).
State.NoHistoryAvailable: Find a fireteam and seek triumph against enemies of the Traveler.
State.PeriodNotFound: The requested period could not be found in this character's activity history.

ErrorBoundary.Discord: Braytech has encountered a fatal error. If one of the available actions does not resolve your issue, please join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) for further assistance.
ErrorBoundary.Version: Please quote the following when reporting this error.

FriendlyError.Description: Please, do not tell Commander Zavala... Yet.
FriendlyError.Name: Pardon Our Dust

NetworkError.Description: A network error has occurred. This is a temporary error which may be resolved by reloading or navigating away from this view.
NetworkError.Name: Network Error

ServiceWorkerInstalling.Description: An app update is installing in the background.

ServiceWorkerReload.Description:
A fresh update for Braytech is available. Please select reload to use a better version of this app.

Check the change log on the index view for details on what's new.
ServiceWorkerReload.Name: Update Available

UnsupportedBrowser.Description:
Braytech requires modern browser features in order to operate. If you encounter this message, it's time to move on to something new.

A Chromium-based browser such as Microsoft Edge is recommended.@className=warning@
UnsupportedBrowser.Name: Unsupported Browser

AuthReset.Description:
While updating authentication data, Bungie returned an unexpected error. As a result, your authentication data has been reset.

Please visit **Settings** to re-authenticate with Bungie.net at your convenience.
AuthReset.Name: Authentication Reset

App.Updated: Braytech was just updated to the latest vesion! Check out the change log for details. Tap this to take a look!
App.MemberServiceInactive:
Due to inactivity, background refresh of your profile data has paused.

Interacting with the app will reactivate the service.
App.WindowSize: This experience works best in a larger window. Make it bigger, honey.
App.MilestonesError: Milestones data failed to load. Bungie's API may be experiencing issues with availablilty.
App.APIIssue: A known [Bungie API issue]({{url}}) prevents Braytech from displaying this correctly at this time.

Data.Description: Delete the authentication data stored on your device. While unnecessary, this function is provided for your peace of mind.
Data.Name: Authentication Data

NoAuth.Description:
Some features of Braytech require your written permission to activate, generally to protect your privacy.

To use this feature, please tell Bungie that you approve. No personal information is shared by doing so‚Äîonly an authentication code with which you may interact with more API endpoints.
NoAuth.Name: Authentication Required

DiffProfile.Description:
You are not authorised to access a different user's profile data, but you may use these helpful links to return to your own.

You can find more information regarding your authentication in the _Settings_ view.
DiffProfile.Name: Oh, honey... Honnnnneyyyy

Friends.Text: Authenticate with Bungie.net to see your Bungie friends list here! It's a handy shortcut to see who's on and to check each other's profiles!

Dresstiny.Text: Authenticate with Bungie.net to create and manage your Dresstiny fits!

Memberships.Description: These are the memberships that are currently associated with your Bungie.net profile.
Memberships.Name: Associated Memberships

Auth.SubscriptionFeature: This is a subscription feature. Some features are made possible only with subscriber support. [Learn more](/settings/subscriptions)

Suggestion.Subtle: Authenticate with Bungie.net to load your profile and unlock tonnes of features.
Suggestion.Text: Most of Braytech's features are available to all users and depend on publically available data, but some of Destiny's features require more explicit access permissions which you can grant to Braytech by authenticating with Bungie.net.

Character.DiffProfile: You're viewing someone else's profile. You can look but if you try to push buttons, don't expect results!

ClanBannerBuilder.Description: Collaborate with clan members on a new clan banner: make your selections and tap Share to show off your style.
ClanBannerBuilder.Name: Clan Banner Builder

Clan.Progression: As your clan levels up, clan banner perks are unlocked for all members. Complete activities throughout the system to increase your clan's level.
Clan.RitualRewards: As a clan, complete ritual activities to unlock engrams from Suraya Hawthorne for all members.

NoClan.Description:
Clans are optional groups of friends that enhance your online gaming experience. Coordinate with your clanmates to take on co-op challenges or just simply represent them in your solo play to earn extra rewards.

Join your friend's clan, meet some new friends, or create your own on the companion app or at [Bungie.net](https://bungie.net/).
NoClan.Name: No clan affiliation

Relationships.NoFriends: You're not alone‚Äìyou'll make a friend eventually... Invite a clan friend to hang out for a few activities!
Relationships.NoParters: No one said dating was easy. Back to the fight, Guardian!
Relationships.SocialButterfly: You get around! You've played with everyone this season.

LimitCurrentSeason.Description: Only load activities from the current season.
LimitCurrentSeason.Name: Current Season

LimitGroupMembers.Description: Filter encounters and fireteams to only include members of your clan.
LimitGroupMembers.Name: Clan Members

LimitBungieFriends.Description: Filter encounters and fireteams to only include Bungie friends.
LimitBungieFriends.Name: Bungie Friends

Commonality.Description: Percentage of players who are crawled and assessed by Voluspa who've completed this badge.
Commonality.Name: Badge Commonality

Collections.CollectiblesAcquired: You have acquired all of these collectibles and chosen to hide them.
Collections.CollectiblesUnavailable: There are no collectibles available for display.

HideCompletedAll.Name: Hide Completed
HideCompletedAll.Description: Hide all collectibles which are acquired by all selected members.

Collections.StashFavourites:
Stash all of your favourite collectibles here!

You can sync your collectibles by enabling sync in [Settings](/settings#sync).

Common.CharacterSpecific: As is with most Braytech features, this view is character-specific.
Common.Name: Name
Common.WebringInfo: Visit a friend of Braytech, another community-created Destiny project.

CreateFit.Name: Create
CreateFit.Description: Create a new fit based on your equipment or fantasy.

AlterFit.Name: Alter
AlterFit.Description: Alter an existing fit and pull tight any loose threads.

Loadout.Info: Adjust your equipment in game before creating a fit. It may take some time for the API to reflect your changes. _Please ensure the displayed equipment matches before submission._ **The latest API data is from {{time}}.**

Overwrite.Info: Overwrite the stored loadout with the selected character's current equipment.
Overwrite.Name: Overwrite Equipment

Name.Info: An original name befitting your unmatched beauty, cutesieness, and machismo.

Description.Info: Descriptions are optional and should be 256 characters or fewer.

Screenshot.Info: Screenshots should be captured from the **Customize Appearance** view in-game. Place your cursor in the bottom middle for best results. **Any deviations from these guidelines may result in your fit failing approval.** For a perfect fit, set your brightness to 4 in game settings.

Url.Info: Include a link to your Reddit r/DestinyFashion post.

Total.Info: The length of this zesty lookbook.
Total.Name: Total

Likes.Info: The number of times the fits have been "checked." The passion of the people is fervorous.
Likes.Name: Likes

Members.Info: The force behind this whirlwind of trendsetting fashion. Every one of them, a trendsetter.
Members.Name: Members

ClassDistribution.Info: It's a popularity contest‚Äìthis is how it's won.
ClassDistribution.Name: Class Distribution

Header.Description:
Welcome to Braytech! Before you get started, I've got a handful of tips for you.

If you have feedback or questions, we can chat on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) or you can check out the [FAQ](/addendums/faq)!
Header.Name: Getting Started

Search.Description:
Need to find something quick? Braytech has a search HUD, available anywhere in the app.

Press **Óªñ** or tap **ÔêÄ**, and start typing!
Search.Name: Search

Settings.Description:
Braytech is jam-packed full of settings from dark themes to item visibility options to settings sync.

Find **ÓÅô** in the top corner.
Settings.Name: Settings

Views.Description: See all of Braytech's features at a glance by selecting **ÔêÉ** from the top of the app!
Views.Name: More

Item.Uninstanced: This item is displayed without any instance data, as it would appear within Collections.
Item.CouldntFindItemForUnequip: An item to equip in {{name}}'s place could not be found on the character which it's located.
Item.CurrentlyCantRoll: This perk can not currently roll for this weapon
Item.PerkEverything: This perk is highly sought after for all activities
Item.PerkPvE: This perk is encouraged for Vanguard engagements
Item.PerkPvP: This perk is encouraged for Crucible engagements
Item.RedeemWithCode: Use code `{{code}}` at [https://www.bungie.net/redeem](https://www.bungie.net/redeem?token={{code}}) to unlock this emblem.
Item.TransferMaximumStack: {{name}} has a maximum stack size of {{size}}. Consume some items and try again.
Item.UndiscoveredCollectibleVendor: Acquire this item to add it to your Collections

Landing.CallToAction: Explore Destiny through Braytech for sweet gains and insight into your fights against the forces of Darkness

Features.Description:
Destiny 2 character progression, clans, triumphs, collections, and more. Braytech is a Destiny fan site that allows users to view and map checklists, track and view triumphs, inspect collectibles, and so much more.

Braytech started as a checklist app and has bellowed into a monstrosity of many talents. It's always being refined and expanded.

Need to find something quick? Press Óªñ and start typing! Braytech has a search interface, available anywhere in the app.

Braytech is built for desktop users first, but functions as well and looks as beautiful on smaller devices. In fact, there's an [iPhone app](https://apps.apple.com/app/braytech/id1593151816) and an [Android app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=braytech.org.twa). Want to make a suggestion? Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech)!
Features.Name: Braytech

Support.Description:
Braytech is a full-time job‚ÄîI design and develop to improve myself and to aid all Guardians. I'm anti-ads, to my own demise. Your support helps me keep the lights on and allows me to do my best work and to make your Destiny experience even better. I hope you love using it as much as I love building it! üíñ

Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) and the other subscribers in the Braytech Research Division.
Support.Name: Are you a fan? Show your support

Landing.PollsChannel: Join the conversation on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) and vote on how Braytech can improve.

Blog.Error: Blog posts couldn't be loaded at this time.
Blog.Name: Blog

Leaderboards.RequestUpdate: As a subscriber, you may request that your profile be immediately updated prior to all leaderboards being updated.
Leaderboards.Unranked: This leaderboard is being ranked with new data. It'll be ready in a few minutes.
Leaderboards.UnrankedMember: This player hasn't been ranked yet. They've been added to the queue and will be ranked provided their progression is public.
Leaderboards.UnrankedGroup: No one in this clan has been ranked yet.

ActiveProfile.Name: You
ActiveProfile.Description: Select a profile to use with Braytech and see your ranks.

GroupSearch.Name: Find Clan
GroupSearch.Description: Look up a clan and see how its members rank.

MemberSearch.Name: Find Guardian
MemberSearch.Description: Look up a friend or foe and see how you compare.

Comparison.Name: Comparison
Comparison.Description:
Triumphs and collectibles which **{{a}}** has but **{{b}}** doesn't.

This comparison is made from live data and as such may contradict the current leaderboard ranking.

Stats.MinActiveScore: Players with at least {{number}} Active Score
Stats.MinCollectionScore: Players with at least {{number}} Collection Score

RankedPlayers.Name: Players ranked
RankedPlayers.Info: Only players who've played Destiny since the latest expansion release are ranked.

RankedDate.Name: Last updated
RankedDate.Info: Leaderboards were last generated with fresh data at this time.

Profile.Description: What gives you power; through light and dark, do you hold the frontlines as a Titan, disintegrate entire armies from afar as a Warlock, or move cowardly through the shadows as a Hunter?

Medals.Description:
Recognition

Digital tokens of recognition, medals celebrate various forms of contribution and achievement. Displayed proudly on your profile, they highlight your involvement, support, and accomplishments within the Destiny community.
Medals.Name: Medals

Activity.Description:
A Ghost's Guardian

Your life after your life begins here. You are a risen, chosen by a Ghost, and bestowed with great power through Light and Darkness.

These were your first steps.
Activity.Name: First Risen

Dresstiny.Description:
Fancy pants

Some say you're a leader in fashion, others say you're a trendsetter, but one thing is for sure: you know how to equip items!

This is the true endgame: Dresstiny.
Dresstiny.Name: Dresstiny

Highlight.Description:
Pride and joy

It's a trophy, a badge of honour, and a mark of distinction. It's the thing you show off to your friends and family.

This is what you want to be known for.
Highlight.Name: Highlight

Ranks.Description:
Through boldness to the stars

Lead fireteams to victory against minions of the Darkness and compete against one another in the Crucible for accolades from Lord Shaxx himself.

This is how you measure up this season.
Ranks.Name: Standing

Commonality.Description:
Triumph and claim your rewards

Earth and worlds beyond touched by the Traveler hold wonderful oddities and sought-after treasures of myth.

The fun is in the chase.
Commonality.Name: Rare Treasures & Exotic Style

Seals.Description:
Emblems of victory

The ultimate measure of a completionist and collector; wear them well.
Seals.Name: Triumph Seals

Gambit.Description:
Infamous

Well, well, well... look who's been stackin' motes and droppin' Blockers like it's target practice. You Guardians are a real storm‚ÄîInvadin', bankin', clearin' waves like it's child's play.

{{number}} wins, huh? That's somethin' special. You're not just playin' Gambit‚Äîyou are Gambit. Reckon the Darkness is takin' notes.
Gambit.Name: Gambit

Crucible.Description:
[Incoherent screaming]

YES! This... this is what the Crucible was MADE for! Your Light blazes like a sun, burning through doubt and weakness! I am HONORED to witness such power! Now get back in there‚Äîshow them what LEGENDS are made of!
Crucible.Name: Crucible

AggregateActivityStats.Description:
Cumulative experience

Sure, you've annihilated "gods," and in some cases, formed weapons from their remains, but just how many times have you thoughtlessly murdered them...
AggregateActivityStats.Name: Aggregate Activity Stats

Share.Description:
Brag about it

Share a link to your Legend and a unique preview image will be generated for you to share with your friends.

This image is generated from your current profile data and updates regularly; however, some services may cache it for a period of time.
Share.Name: Share

Error.Description: Something very unexpected and irrecoverable occurred.

BungieError.Description:
Crucial API data couldn't be loaded at this time. This is an intermittent issue. Please try again.

If this error does persist, the API may be experiencing a wider outage or your local network is restricting Bungie API requests.
BungieError.Name: Bungie Error

VoluspaError.Description: Braytech couldn't reach the Voluspa network. Please verify your WAN accessibility.
VoluspaError.Name: Voluspa Error

IndexedDBError.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to access browser storage.

If this error occurs again, your browser or device may be incompatible or improperly configured.

IndexedDBErrorFatal.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to access browser storage.

Please reload the app and try again.

IndexedDBOpenFailedError.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to access browser storage.

Some browsers disallow access to _Indexed DB_ when browsing in private modes.

Please reload the app and try again.

MaintenanceError.Description:
The Bungie API is currently down for maintenance.

Tune into @BungieHelp on Twitter for more information.
MaintenanceError.Name: Bungie Maintenance

ManifestDownloadError.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to download the manifest from Bungie.

Please reload the app and try again.
ManifestDownloadError.Name: Manifest download failed

ManifestError.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to update the manifest with Bungie.

Please reload the app and try again.
ManifestError.Name: Manifest error

NoInternetError.Description: Are you offline? Your web browser thinks you are...

SettingsFetchError.Description:
Something went wrong while trying to collect the API configuration from Bungie.

Please reload the app and try again.
SettingsFetchError.Name: Configuration failure

Inspect.RelatedVideo: This node has a related video: {{url}}

Nodes.UnavailableInGame: Unavailable: this node is no longer available in-game.
Nodes.UnavailableUnreliableApi: Unavailable: something is preventing this node from relaying its status reliably.

ProposeChanges.Description: Submit a proposal for changes to this node's data and improve maps for other Guardians.

Description.Placeholder: Example: by a rock on the far side of the last room

Issues.Placeholder: Example: the node is no longer accessible

Screenshots.Description:
Proposed screenshots must meet a strict quality criteria:
- display resolution of 1920x1080
- no visible HUD
- no visible Guardians or equipment
- no visible enemies
- maximum video settings
  - including a render resolution of 200%

Surveyor.NoNodes: Select a position on the map to begin.

CopyLink.Fail: I failed to copy this link to your clipboard.
CopyLink.Success: A link has been copied to your clipboard.

PostmasterCapacityWarning.DescriptionAlmostFull: The Postmaster is almost out of space. If you do not retrieve your items, you will lose them forever!
PostmasterCapacityWarning.DescriptionFull: The Postmaster is completely out of space. If you do not retrieve your items, you will lose them forever!
PostmasterCapacityWarning.Name: Warning!

SubscriptionEndpointChanged.Description:
While you were out touching grass, your device rescinded Voluspa's authority to send you push notifications.

You may want to review your settings if this is not what you wanted.
SubscriptionEndpointChanged.Name: Push Notifications

ProfileSearch.CrossSaveProfile: This player has enabled Cross Save.

Network.Description: A network error has occurred. This is a temporary error which may be resolved by dismissing the dialog and trying again.
Network.Name: Network Error

Banned.Botting: Player was observed employing mechanisms to avoid inactivity detection countermeasures (botting).
Banned.Hacking: Player was observed using external tools to manipulate the rules of engagement (hacking).
Banned.Teabagging: Player was observed engaging in behaviours that are not conducive of a friendly environment.

CharacterMissing.Description: The character you tried to load is unavailable‚Äîmaybe it's been deleted.
CharacterMissing.Name: Character Unavailable

MemberBanned.Description: This Destiny profile has been banned from this app. This isn't an error.
MemberBanned.Name: Profile Banned

PrivateProgression.Description:
This profile's progression data isn't available. Their profile may be set to private on Bungie.net.

Profile privacy settings can be changed on Bungie.net.
PrivateProgression.Name: Private Profile

NoCharacters.Description: This player hasn't created any characters yet!
NoCharacters.Name: No Characters

ProfileSearch.GetStarted: Looks like you may be new here! You can get started by tapping **Authenticate** and logging in at Bungie.net or you can search for your Bungie name and load your profile manually!
ProfileSearch.Authenticate: Authenticate securely with Bungie.net to load your profile, enable profile actions such as inventory management, and unlock tonnes of other features.
ProfileSearch.RemoveHistory: Right click a profile to remove it from the list.
ProfileSearch.ThirdPartyApps: View this player's profile on one of our friend's apps.
ProfileSearch.ContentOwned: This player owns the following content on the platform which they last played.

Progression.ResetVendor: Return to the vendor to reset your rank
Progression.Title: Title

Quests.NoBounties: Bounties you acquire will appear here.
Quests.NoQuests: Quests you acquire will appear here.
Quests.ProjectedRanks: The value of your completed bounties equates to the above season pass ranks should you claim them.
Quests.BountiesValue: The value of your completed bounties.

Error.MissingDefinitions: Failed to perform a manifest search because there are no definitions in the index.

Results.MatchesAllHidden: There is a match, but you've chosen to hide it!
Results.MatchesAllHidden_plural: There are {{count}} matches, but you've chosen to hide them!
Results.Top10Upsell: Showing the top 10 matches. Press Óªñ at any time for a full search experience.
Results.TopNSpecificity: Showing the top {{number}} matches. Try being more specific.

Search.ShortcutKey: Press Óªñ to toggle search from anywhere
Search.Suggestions:
Search supports filters as prefixes. You may also search by manifest identifier. For example, the best weapon in the game, `564802913`.

Trying to find a Braytech feature? Search for what it may be named.

Results are prioritised by name, source, and description.

ExperimentalFeatures.Description: Start using features which may not yet be properly developed, refined, or quality checked.
ExperimentalFeatures.Name: Enable Experimental Features

LogDetails.Description: Console.log details for the mouse-invoked node.
LogDetails.Name: Log Node Details

Surveyor.Description: An additional maps control allowing the easy and rapid collection of map nodes.
Surveyor.Name: Use Surveyor

ClearCache.Description: Clear cached assets such as map images. These assets are downloaded as they're required.
ClearCache.Name: Clear Cache

ClearManifest.Description: Delete the Destiny manifest stored on this device. Braytech requires the manifest to function and it will be downloaded again next time the app is started.
ClearManifest.Name: Clear Manifest

ClearReports.Description: Delete all post game carnage reports stored on this device.
ClearReports.Name: Clear Reports

Usage.Description: Storage used by Destiny's manifest, cached post game carnage reports, and cached assets.
Usage.Name: Usage

AlternateAppIcon.Info: Alter the appearance of the app's icon.

FlipSubviewNav.Info: For users who want to be different and for users who use Braytech on their mobile device with their right hand.

ItemSize.Info: Adjust the size of inventory item icons for most Braytech features.

HideCompletedCollectibles.Description: If a collectible has been acquired, it will be hidden under Collections views.
HideCompletedCollectibles.Name: Hide Acquired Collection Items

HideCompletedRecords.Description: If a triumph is completed and redeemed, it will be hidden under Triumphs views.
HideCompletedRecords.Name: Hide Completed Triumphs

HideDudRecords.Description: Hide dud (empty or unused) triumphs from view. This is a manually curated [list](/triumphs/dud).
HideDudRecords.Name: Hide Dud Triumphs

HideInvisibleCollectibles.Description: If the game specifies that you are unable to see a particular collectible, it will be hidden under Collections views.
HideInvisibleCollectibles.Name: Hide Invisible Collection Items

HideInvisibleRecords.Description: If the game specifies that you are unable to see a particular triumph, it will render as "Secret" under Triumphs views.
HideInvisibleRecords.Name: Hide Invisible Triumphs

HideUnobtainableRecords.Description: Hide unobtainable triumphs from view. This is a manually curated [list](/triumphs/unobtainable).
HideUnobtainableRecords.Name: Hide Unobtainable Triumphs

ResetEverything.Description: Reset all user settings, saved data, and history.
ResetEverything.Name: Reset Everything

ResetNotifications.Description: Reset dismissed notifications to their default state.
ResetNotifications.Name: Reset Notifications

ResetProfileHistory.Description: Delete the stored list of previously loaded profiles (Profile Search).
ResetProfileHistory.Name: Reset Profile History

ResetTips.Description: Restore informational tips to their default state.
ResetTips.Name: Reset Tips

ResetTrackedTriumphs.Description: Untrack all user-tracked triumphs. Will not affect the state of in-game triumphs.
ResetTrackedTriumphs.Name: Reset Tracked Triumphs

Colloquial.Description: Activate user-contributed slang in place of official texts.
Colloquial.Name: Use Colloquial Language

Checklists.Info: Toggle the visibility of checklists. Keep it clean.

Developer.Info: Tools to assist developers when working on maps

HideDiscoveredNodes.Description: If a node has been discovered, omit it from the map unless selected.
HideDiscoveredNodes.Name: Hide Discovered Nodes

Atmosphere.Description: Display weather such as cloud cover.
Atmosphere.Name: Atmosphere

VisualFidelity.Info: Alter the appearance of visual flourishes

Profile.Info: Braytech makes it easy to view many player profiles, but it remembers the last profile you selected from [Profile Search](/profile-search).

PushNotifications.Info:
Push notifications use browser and operating system APIs to send you notifications even when you're not using the app.

If you want Braytech to send you notifications, you can control if, when, and why, here.
PushNotifications.Incompatible: Your browser doesn't support push notifications yet.
PushNotifications.NoServiceWorker: A service worker hasn't been installed yet. Try reloading Braytech.
PushNotifications.PermissionDenied: You've denied permission to send notifications. You'll need to manually enable or reset them before we can continue. Check your browser and device settings.
PushNotifications.ServiceWorkerInstalling: A service worker is installing. Please wait.

PreviewNotifications.Description: Select to preview configured notifications. Voluspa will dispatch them to your device immediately.
PreviewNotifications.Name: Preview Notifications

PushNotifications.Stats: **{{subscriptions}}** subscribed devices by **{{subscribers}}** users, of which **{{subscribed}}** support Braytech with a subscription.

ReloadRequired.Description: Select reload app to activate your changes immediately.
ReloadRequired.Name: Reload Required

Reports.Info: Once downloaded, reports are saved to device storage for rapid access after the fact. All reports are associated with the member through which they were originally viewed. You can clear them here, member by member. You may wish to do this in order to minimise initial load time, if you've downloaded many reports.
Reports.NoReports: No reports are stored on this device.

HideFeatureSuggestions.Description: Hold your breath‚ÄìI know what I'm doing.
HideFeatureSuggestions.Name: Hide Feature Suggestions

ItemVisibilityOverride.Description: Use this setting to override global Item Visibility settings for triumphs and collectibles.
ItemVisibilityOverride.Name: Show Completed and Acquired

Subscriptions.Info:
Ads suck so Braytech doesn't use them, but none of this is free or easy!

In place of ads, I depend on your generosity. Your support helps keep the app online, enables me to work on new features, and pays my rent!

Subscribe to one of the following tiers for privileged features!
Subscriptions.Help: You can get help with this at any time by jumping on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) or by emailing [subscriptions@bray.tech](mailto:subscriptions@bray.tech).
Subscriptions.HelpMore:
You can get help with this at any time by jumping on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) or by emailing [subscriptions@bray.tech](mailto:subscriptions@bray.tech).

Your question may have been answered already in [Frequently Asked Questions](/addendums/faq).

If you have feedback of any sort, please deliver it, [direct to me](mailto:subscriptions@bray.tech) or via [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech), so I may improve my service!
Subscriptions.AuthRequired: Authenticate with Bungie.net to create or manage a subscription.

State.Ending: You subscribed on **{{created}}** and your subscription will **end** on **{{currentPeriodEnd}}**.
State.Renewing: You subscribed on **{{created}}** and your subscription will **renew** on **{{currentPeriodEnd}}**.

DiscordProfile.Disconnected:
Connect your Discord profile by using the `/register_discord_with_voluspa` command in the Discord [server](https://discord.bray.tech).

Get your server perks and participate in the conversation to help shape Braytech's development!

Subscriptions.Stripe: Visit Stripe to manage your subscription.

Newsletter.Name: Receive Email
Newsletter.Description: Get Braytech's blog posts and any relevant subscriber information delivered directly to your inbox.

Subscriptions.Blog: Keep track of Braytech's development by following along with the latest blog posts. I try to keep these as interesting and insightful as I can!
Subscriptions.Discord: Join the Braytech community! Hang out, drop suggestions, report bugs, and get help for the app instantly.
Subscriptions.NewSubs: Recent subscribers who carry Braytech on their shoulders, enabling its continuous development.
Subscriptions.OneTime: Make a one-time donation to support Braytech. No strings attached, but I will take you out for a drink.

Username.Description:
Shorten your address from a bunch of long numbers to something superior.

Choose a unique name or match your Bungie name, it's up to you. This is just another cute way to distinguish yourself from other players and it makes it easier to go straight to your profile on a device you haven't used.

Emoji supported **üê∏**
Username.Name: Username

Highlight.Description:
Choose to highlight a special triumph or an impressive stat tracker.

This highlight is displayed on your [Legend](/legend) view and in images generated for links you share around the internet.
Highlight.Name: Highlight

EmblemCodes.Description:
Braytech has amassed a grand collection of emblem codes, sometimes contributed to by its most benevolent users.

As a subscriber, you may redeem an emblem code from [The Developer's Stash]({{url}}).
EmblemCodes.Name: Emblem Codes

AdvancedLeaderboards.Description:
If you're a [Leaderboards](/leaderboards) power user, you've got two more tools in your inventory.

As a subscriber, you can compare the difference between two adjacent players on a leaderboard, and you can choose to update your profile's Leaderboards data and reassess all leaderboards on demand.
AdvancedLeaderboards.Name: Advanced Leaderboards

Medal.Description: High tier subscribers unlock a permanent medal for their profiles, displayed wherever their profile appears, both on roster entries and in player details dialogs.
Medal.Name: Medals

PriorityDevelopment.Description:
Braytech is only as great as its usefulness to its users. I, the developer, have always taken feedback and suggestions from users.

Users have made Braytech greater, and I'll prioritse your feedback and suggesstions.
PriorityDevelopment.Name: Priority Development

Newsletter.Description: Subscribe to Braytech's newsletter to receive blog posts and more directly to your email inbox. It's an old Cryptarch technology, but it's functional.
Newsletter.Name: Newsletter

BraytechLegend.Info:
Brandish your profile with a unique username to make sharing easier, select a triumph or tracker to highlight when your profile is shared, and choose a character to default to when a link to your profile is shared without a character specified.

[Subscribers](/settings/subscriptions) get many perks including the ability to grab a custom username.
BraytechLegend.AuthRequired: Authenticate with Bungie.net to alter Legend settings.
BraytechLegend.SubscriptionRequired: To claim a username and other cool tricks, you need to be a subscriber. [Support Braytech](/settings/subscriptions) through a subscription.
BraytechLegend.Username:
Select a unique username or fallback to your Bungie name. You can change this at any time.

A branding specialist is available upon request for a modest fee.
BraytechLegend.UsernameSpecifications: Maximum length for usernames is 127 characters. Any word character (equivalent to [a-zA-Z0-9_]) and some emoji are supported.
BraytechLegend.DefaultCharacter:
You can choose a character to be a default for links shared without a character identifier.

For example, if you share a link to https://bray.tech/@/{{username}}, Braytech will ask the viewer to select a character. You can select a preferred character instead.
BraytechLegend.ShareHighlight: When your profile is shared, an image specific to you is generated. You can choose to highlight a triumph or tracker you're proud of. This will also be displayed on the [Legend](/legend) view.

DeleteSyncedSettings.Description: Disable sync and delete settings stored with Voluspa.
DeleteSyncedSettings.Name: Delete Synced Settings

DownloadSyncedSettings.Description: Download synced settings immediately, overwriting current settings.
DownloadSyncedSettings.Name: Download Synced Settings

Enable.Description: Enable sync and regularly sync with Voluspa.

Sync.Info: Sync your settings for item visibility, maps, tracked triumphs, and profile search history.
Sync.RequirementsNotMet: Synchronisation requires that you first authenticate Braytech with Bungie.net.

PromptForMinorVersions.Description: Notify me to update even for minor versions.
PromptForMinorVersions.Name: Minor Version Updates

ReloadAppAutomatically.Description: When an update for Braytech is ready, reload the app automatically irregardless of what you're doing.
ReloadAppAutomatically.Name: Reload App Automatically

SystemPreference.Name: Match System
SystemPreference.Description: Where supported, Braytech will mirror your system preference.

DumpServiceWorker.Description: Attempt to unregister the installed service worker. If successful, reloading the app will allow a new service worker to take its place.
DumpServiceWorker.Name: Dump Service Worker

UpdateServiceWorker.Description: Attempt to update the service worker immediately. This function will disable the button temporarily. You may continue to use Braytech while it attempts to update in the background. If successful, you will be prompted to reload the app.
UpdateServiceWorker.Name: Update Service Worker

Gay.Description: Gay it up, bitch. Light up your life with fabulous, limited edition, ground-shattering, Braytech¬Æ exclusive! technological innovation.
Gay.Name: Enable üåà

ReducedMotion.Description: Reduce the motion of the user interface, namely by disabling various animations. Reduces CPU usage.
ReducedMotion.Name: Reduced Motion

Delete.Failure: Your settings could not be deleted at this time. This is a temporary failure.
Delete.Success: Your settings have been deleted. Sync is now disabled.

Merge.Failure: While trying to merge your settings, there was an error. This is a temporary failure.

Sync.Failure: While trying to sync your settings, there was an error. This is a temporary failure.

Triumphs.NonePartiallyComplete: No partially completed triumphs. Choose an objective and get started!
Triumphs.NearLimit: Display is limited to **{{number}}** triumphs for performance reasons.

Classified.Description: This triumph is classified and may be revealed at a later time.
Classified.Name: Classified Triumph

Details.NoClanOrFireteam: Join a fireteam or a clan to see how your fellow Guardians stack up next to you!
Details.LoadBungieFriends: Would you like to display your Bungie friends? This will take a few seconds.
Details.HasItem: This triumph is related to an item. You can view this item's [details]({{string}}).

Record.Commonality: Percentage of players who are crawled and assessed by Voluspa who've completed this triumph.
Record.Expiration: This triumph may no longer be obtainable once expired.
Record.Expires: Expires at the end of Season {{season}}
Record.ScoreProgress: The score value earned for this triumph.

Triumphs.BraytechActiveScore: Your active triumph score is **{{number}}**, as determined by Braytech. This value is calculated by examining available triumphs.
Triumphs.BungieActiveScore: According to Bungie, your score is **{{number}}**. This may be inaccurate as it may not consider some triumphs which have since been removed or had their score values altered.
Triumphs.PotentialUnattainedScore: The Guardian has **{{number}}** score waiting to be to unlocked.
Triumphs.RecordsRedeemed: You have redeemed all of these triumphs and chosen to hide them.
Triumphs.RecordsUnavailable: There are no triumphs available for display.

Commonality.Description: Percentage of players who are crawled and assessed by Voluspa who've acquired this title.
Commonality.Name: Seal Commonality

CommonalityGilded.Description: Percentage of players who are crawled and assessed by Voluspa who've acquired and gilded this title.
CommonalityGilded.Name: Gilded Seal Commonality

Secret.Name: Secret Triumph
Secret.Description: A mystery that you haven't yet unraveled.

GrantsScore.Name: Grants Score
GrantsScore.Description: Only display triumphs which grant score upon completion.

MatchClass.Name: Match Class
MatchClass.Description: Only display class-related triumphs which match the selected character's class.

Flatten.Name: Flatten
Flatten.Description: Use a flat list for display rather than a tree-style view.

HideCompletedAll.Name: Hide Completed
HideCompletedAll.Description: Hide all triumphs which are completed by all selected members.

CollapseAll.Name: Collapse All
CollapseAll.Description: Collapse all nodes so that you may explore at your own leisure.

Triumphs.NoTrackedRecords:
You aren't tracking any triumphs yet! You can track a triumph by interacting with the green marker.

You can sync your triumphs by enabling sync in [Settings](/settings#sync).
Triumphs.NoHiddenRecords:
You aren't hiding any triumphs yet!

You can sync your triumphs by enabling sync in [Settings](/settings#sync).
Triumphs.TrackedSync: Sync tracked triumphs between devices with Voluspa.
Triumphs.PinPresentationNodes: Right click a presentation node to pin it to the top of the list.

Subscriptions.Info:
Ads suck so Braytech doesn't use them, but building Braytech costs time.

In place of ads, Braytech depends on your generosity. Your support helps keep the app online, enables work on new features, and keeps the developer alive and housed

Check out [Subscriptions](/settings/subscriptions) to see the kinds of perks you could be in for!
Subscriptions.RewardSeraph: Unlock the **Seraph** medal, a symbol of dedication and commitment to protecting the Warmind and its assets, and bettering humankind.
Subscriptions.RewardSubmind: Unlock the animated **Warmind** gold tier medal. Every Warmind medal guarenteed to contain at least 7.00% Warmind fragment dust‚Ñ¢
Subscriptions.Rewards: Unlock unique profile medals when you subscribe to Braytech's Patreon!
Subscriptions.Leaderboards: Leaderboards are a lot of work, which while thought-provoking, is particularly costly. I had to buy Databases for Dummies and everything. If you like collecting things, maybe I could [interest you in unlocking some a rare medal](/settings/subscriptions) for your Braytech profile?
Subscriptions.MemberLinkExample:
This could be _you_, with a cool little medal on your member link to demonstrate your support for Braytech and its development.

_Braytech and its subsidiaries do not endorse the actions of Clovis Bray I or their variants._
Subscriptions.UpsellInfo: Your support helps keep the app online, enables work on new features, and keeps the developer alive!

FailureStrings.UniquenessViolation: Can only hold one at a time

AdjustGraph.Description:
View this data in a different manner by selecting an alternate type of graph.

**Voluspa** collects data from {{crawled}} players. Of those players, **{{assessed}}** were successfully **assessed** for the purpose of providing this data. Of {{assessed}} assessed players, **{{frequency}}** have **discovered** this collectible.
AdjustGraph.Description_record:
View this data in a different manner by selecting an alternate type of graph.

**Voluspa** collects data from {{crawled}} players. Of those players, **{{assessed}}** were successfully **assessed** for the purpose of providing this data. Of {{assessed}} assessed players, **{{frequency}}** have **completed** this triumph.
AdjustGraph.Name: Adjust Graph

Voluspa.Crawled: {{number}} players are currently crawled by Voluspa.
Voluspa.Assessed: {{number}} players are currently assessed by Voluspa.

Weeklies.NoActivitiesAvailable: There aren't any activities available to you. Perhaps you don't meet the requirements...
Weeklies.NoActivitiesAvailableNoLicense: There aren't any activities available to you as you don't own the required expansion.

Event.TriumphsInfo: This event has a related seal, **{{seal}}**. Complete these triumphs to earn a new title.

ArtifactPower.Description: A bonus to your Light level, channeled by your equipped seasonal artifact through experience gained.
ArtifactPower.Name: Artifact Power Bonus

GearPower.Description: The average Power level of your currently equipped armaments.
GearPower.Name: Gear Power

Challenges.NoChallenges: You've smashed all of your available challenges this week!

Power.Description: Your Light level is an aggregate of the Power value across all of your currently equipped gear. A higher Light level improves both your damage output and your defense.
Power.Name: Light

Challenges.WorldDropsNeeded: Seek out world drops until you've reached **ÓÄ∏{{light}}** to avoid wasting drops with greater potential.
Challenges.PowerfulDropsNeeded: Engage with activities which reward Powerful Gear to reach **ÓÄ∏{{light}}**.
Challenges.PinnacleDropsNeeded: You're on the Pinnacle Gear grind. Attain **ÓÄ∏{{light}}** by completing the most challenging activities.
